body_html:
It's hard to disagree with the preference of using components over copy-pasted code (No worries, I wouldn't put the above in a PR).
On the other hand I think this has to be balanced with keeping the user-facing parts compatible. That's why I wouldn't want to have an embedding and a bn submodule (and not reset_parameters with te CBN-Module) in a pytorch-included api, but rather see to accomodating both with minimal changes to _BatchNorm.
But the word is still out whether we want this at all or let everyone do it herself.
